extensionDescription.message: Styr dine cookies! Slet ubrugte cookies automatisk når du lukker dine faner, og behold dem du vil beholde.
extensionDescription.description: Control your cookies! Auto-delete unused cookies from your closed tabs while keeping the ones you want.

cookieCleanupIgnoreOpenTabsText.message: Slet nu, inkluder cookies fra åbne faner
cookieCleanupIgnoreOpenTabsText.description: Run cleanup now, include cookies from open tabs

welcomeMessage.message: Hej der! I løbet af denne session har Cookie AutoDelete slettet $sessionDeleted$ cookies, og i alt $totalDeleted$ cookies.
welcomeMessage.description: Hi there! During this session, Cookie AutoDelete has deleted 123 cookies and in total 456 cookies.

oldReleasesText.message: Older release notes can be viewed online at
oldReleasesText.description: Older release notes can be viewed online at

reasonKeepOpenTab.description: Keep because of open tabs of *.google.com

reasonCleanStartupNoList.message: Slet pga. opstartssletning og $hostname$ ikke er i hvid/grå-listerne
reasonCleanStartupNoList.description: Clean because of startup cleanup and sub.google.com is not in the White/Grey lists

reasonCleanGreyList.message: Slet pga. opstartssletning og $matchedExpression$ er i grålisten
reasonCleanGreyList.description: Clean because of startup cleanup and *.google.com is in the Greylist

reasonCleanNoList.message: Slet pga. $hostname$ ikke er i hvid/grå-listerne
reasonCleanNoList.description: Clean because sub.google.com is not in the White/Grey lists

reasonKeep.description: Keep because of matched *.google.com in the Whitelist

reasonCleanCookieName.description: Partial clean because of matched *.google.com in the Whitelist

reasonTabsWereNotIgnored.description: Clean because of sub.google.com is not in the White/Grey lists or in any open tabs

reasonTabsWereIgnored.description: Clean because of sub.google.com is not in the White/Grey lists and also open tabs were ignored

reviewLinkMessage.message: Tak for at prøve Cookie AutoDelete. Hvis du kan lide den, så giv en anmeldelse.
reviewLinkMessage.description: Thanks for trying out Cookie AutoDelete. If you liked it, then please give a review.

activeModeText.message: Aktiver automatisk sletning? Forsinkelse før sletning:
activeModeText.description: Enable Automatic Cleaning? Delay Before Cleaning:

showNumberOfCookiesInIconText.message: Vis antal cookies for det domæne
showNumberOfCookiesInIconText.description: Show Number of Cookies for that Domain

notifyCookieCleanUpText.message: Vis meddelelse efter sletning af cookies

cookieCleanUpOnStartText.message: Slet cookies fra åbne faner ved opstart
cookieCleanUpOnStartText.description: Clean Cookies from Open Tabs on Startup

contextualIdentitiesEnabledText.description: Enable Support for Firefox's Container Tabs

localstorageAndContextualIdentitiesWarni.message: Aktivering af både oprydning af offline-indhold og kontekst-faneblade kan forårsage uventede sideeffekter pga. API-begrænsninger
localstorageAndContextualIdentitiesWarni.description: Enabling both Localstorage Cleanup and Container Tabs might cause some unwanted side effects due to API Limitations

toGreyListText.message: Føj til gråliste (slet når netlæseren genstarter)
toGreyListText.description: Add to Greylist (Clean on Browser Restart)

exportURLSTitle.message:
Et tidsstempel vil blive tilføjet til filnavnet ved eksport.
Problemer med at hente? Højreklik denne knap og klik 'Gem link som...' for at hente.
exportURLSTitle.description:
A timestamp will be appended to the filename on export.
Having trouble downloading?  Right-Click this button and click 'Save Link As...' to download.

reportIssuesText.message: Rapporter fejl og mangler, og foreslå funktionalitet

faqText.message: Frequently Asked Questions, Common issues and solutions
faqText.description: Frequently Asked Questions, Common issues and solutions

disableAutoDeleteText.message: Skift for at deaktivere automatisk sletning (manuel tilstand)
disableAutoDeleteText.description: Toggle to disable automatic cleanup (manual mode)

enableAutoDeleteText.message: Skift for at aktivere automatisk sletning (automatisk tilstand)
enableAutoDeleteText.description: Toggle to enable automatic cleanup (automatic mode)

toggleNotificationText.message: Skift for at aktivere eller deaktivere meddelelser
toggleNotificationText.description: Toggle to enable or disable notifications
